channel.title: Terminal in mac. Please help!
channel.description:
hey guys, im trying to start a rsps on a mac and ive opened termal and put CD *dragged sourced folder here* and then put in javac *.java, and this error comes up.. please help!!
Last login: Sun Jan 6 22:28:42 on ttys000 Lee-Elvins-MacBook-Pro:~ leeelvin$ cd /Volumes/NO\ NAME/Rune-Creation\ Source Lee-Elvins-MacBook-Pro:Rune-Creation Source leeelvin$ javac *.java javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Lee-Elvins-MacBook-Pro:Rune-Creation Source leeelvin$

item.title: Terminal in mac. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Ljelvin Ljelvin
item.description:
@Ljelvin wrote:

hey guys, im trying to start a rsps on a mac and ive opened termal and put CD dragged sourced folder here and then put in javac *.java, and this error comes upâ€¦ please help!!

Lee-Elvins-MacBook-Pro:~ leeelvin$ cd /Volumes/NO\ NAME/Rune-Creation\ Source
